title: Lyon e-Sport #9 28. Februar, lassen Sie uns einen großen Sonntag verbringen mit LoL ;)

embed.title: Lyon e-Sport #9 - Trailer
embed.description: Trailer de la Lyon e-Sport #9 du 26 au 28 février au Palais des Sports de Lyon ! Infos: http://www.lyonesport9.eu/actualites/assistez-la-lyon-e-sport-9/ Billetterie: http://www.lyonesport9.eu/billeterie/ www.lyon-esport.fr www.facebook.com/LyoneSport www.twitter.com/LyoneSport

body:
Hi everybody,

Sorry I am writing in English, not in German, but I heard you guys are way better in English than my people, so it is time to show it :p

I open this discussion to talk about the Lyon e-Sport #9, taking place next week-end, 26th to 28th of February. 
It is one of the biggest League of Legends competitive European event with some teams from **Challenger Series or former LCS such as Millenium or Renegates** as well as other well-knowed teams like **Na’Vi**. They will try to get away with the 15 000 euros of cash prize, and you will see former as well as future LCS players fighting for it!

(You can put English subtitles on the trailer, even if there is probably not a lot you will have trouble to understand :p )

You can follow the event on streams, and at least **the final will be broadcasted in English on Sunday!**
Join us on the stream or live in Lyon to spend quality time with high level League of Legends matches in a convivial atmosphere ;)
You will find it during the event on the dedicated website http://www.lyonesport9.eu/

If you have any question, feel free to ask!

See you very soon :)
